== Ella (626714) ==
      
Ella is a village in the [[Tiswadi]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 634.46 hectares and harbouring 1258 households with total population of 5372 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 2702 and female population is 2670. Scheduled Caste Population is 62 and Scheduled Tribes population is 386. Census Location Code of the village is 626714<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 2046 (76.63%)
